A white board with handwritten notes is shared. The notes include topics like "Biomass sources already", "Technical Change", "National Strategy", "Leakage", "Moving to a 100x or 1000x", and "Appendix on negative emissions". No changes are made to the content during this segment.

Initially, the same whiteboard with handwritten notes is shared. At [02:31], the content on the whiteboard changes to a new set of handwritten notes. These notes are categorized into two columns: "Maybe" and "I'm hoping". Under "Maybe", there are points like "Biomass sources already", "Technical Change", and "National Strategy". Under "I'm hoping", there are points like "Leakage", "Moving to a 100x or 1000x", and "Appendix on negative emissions". At [03:38], the content changes again to a new set of notes. These notes list various sectors like "Energy", "Transportation", "Industry", "Buildings", "DAC", "Natural Solutions", "Steel", "Cement", "Large Vehicles", and "Food". These sectors are further categorized into "Easy" and "Hard" to decarbonize. At [04:21], the content changes to a list of notes including "Solar + Wind", "Carbon Neutral Fuels", "Integrated System View", and "Tools". No further changes are made to the content during this segment.
